original_text: And he set the bread in order upon it before the Lord; as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 또 여호와 앞 그 상 위에 떡을 진설하니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: And he set the bread in order upon it
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 위에 빵을 순서대로 놓았고

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded Moses
